title: TCL Team Boxing League
overview: TCL's 2025 season—its third—will launch with the Boston vs. New York battle (from Foxwoods Casino), featuring teams composed of rising male and female talent alongside seasoned veterans. Competitors in the first and only professional boxing league with a team-based ownership model will face off across 12 different weight classes in 24 action-packed, three-minute rounds, with team performance determining the overall winner.
